pages.text: 20|13|aur mainne tujhe chun[1] liya hai. atah dhyaan se sun, jo vahî€¼yee kee ja rahee hai.
20|14|nihsandeh main hee allaah hoon, mere siva koee poojy nahin, to meree hee ibaadat (vandana) kar tatha mere smaran (yaad) ke lie namaaz kee sthaapana[1] kar.
20|15|nishchay pralay aane vaalee hai, main use gupt rakhana chaahata hoon, taaki pratikaar (badala) diya jaaye, pratyek praanee ko usake prayaas ke anusaar.
20|16|atah, tumhen na rok de, us ( ke vishvaas) se, jo usapar eemaan (vishvaas) nahin rakhata aur anusaran kiya apanee ichchha ka, anyatha tera naash ho jaayega.
20|17|aur he moosa! ye tere daahine haath mein kya hai
20|18|uttar diyaah ye meree laathee hai; main isapar sahaara leta hoon, isase apanee bakariyon ke lie patte jhaadata hoon tatha meree isamen doosaree aavashyaktaayen (bhee) hain.
20|19|kahaah ise phenkie, he moosa
20|20|to usane use phenk diya aur sahasa vah ek sarp thee, jo dod raha tha.
20|21|kahaah pakad le ise, aur dar nahin, ham ise pher denge, isakee pratham sthiti kee or.
20|22|aur apana haath laga de apanee kaankh (bagal) kee or, vah nikalega chamakata hua bina kisee rog ke, ye doosara chamatkaar hai.
20|23|taaki ham tujhe dikhaayen, apanee badee nishaaniyaan.
20|24|tum firaun ke paas jao, vah vidrohee ho gaya hai.
20|25|moosa ne praarthana keeh he mere paalanahaar! khol de, mere lie mera seena.
20|26|tatha saral kar de, mere lie mera kaam.
20|27|aur khol de, meree zubaan kee gaanth.
20|28|taaki log meree baat samajhen.
20|29|tatha bana de, mera ek sahaayak mere parivaar mein se.
20|30|mere bheeee haaroon ko.
20|31|usake dvaara drdh kar de meree shakti ko.
20|32|aur saajhee bana de, use mere kaam mein.
20|33|taaki ham donon teree pavitrata ka gaan adhik karen.
20|34|tatha tujhe adhik smaran (yaad) karen.
20|35|nihsandeh, too hamen bhalee prakaar dekhane-bhaalane vaala hai.
20|36|allaah ne kahaah he moosa! teree sab maang pooree kar dee gayee.
20|37|aur ham upakaar kar chuke hain tumapar ek baar aur[1] (bhee).
